mapper.select: select r.r_id,r.status,r.type,r.time,r.academic_overview,r.technology_overview,r.research_overview, r.course_overview,r.experience,r.lacking,r.measure,r.plan from report r where r.r_id = #{r_id}
mapper.insert: insert into competition(r_id, c_index,title, award, rank, per_num) values(#{competition.r_id},#{competition.c_index}, #{competition.title}, #{competition.award}, #{competition.rank}, #{competition.per_num})

insert into service(r_id,s_index, type, content, status, spend_time, per_num, per_contribution) values(#{service.r_id}, #{service.s_index},#{service.type}, #{service.content}, #{service.status}, #{service.spend_time}, #{service.per_num}, #{service.per_contribution})
mapper.update: update academic set title = #{academic.title}, status = #{academic.status}, authors = #{academic.authors}, details = #{academic.details}, per_num = #{academic.per_num}, per_contribution = #{academic.per_contribution} where a_index = #{academic.a_index} and r_id = #{academic.r_id}

update competition set title = #{competition.title}, award = #{competition.award}, rank = #{competition.rank}, per_num = #{competition.per_num} where c_index = #{competition.c_index} and r_id = #{competition.r_id}

update intellectual set title = #{intellectual.title}, status = #{intellectual.status}, authors = #{intellectual.authors}, type = #{intellectual.type}, per_num = #{intellectual.per_num}, per_contribution = #{intellectual.per_contribution} where i_index = #{intellectual.i_index} and r_id = #{intellectual.r_id}

update report set status = #{report.status}, type = #{report.type}, time = #{report.time}, academic_overview = #{report.academic_overview}, technology_overview = #{report.technology_overview}, research_overview = #{report.research_overview}, course_overview = #{report.course_overview}, experience = #{report.experience}, lacking = #{report.lacking}, measure = #{report.measure}, plan = #{report.plan} where r_id = #{report.r_id}

update research set title = #{research.title}, chapter = #{research.chapter}, status = #{research.status}, authors = #{research.authors}, per_num = #{research.per_num}, per_contribution = #{research.per_contribution} where r_index = #{research.r_index} and r_id = #{research.r_id}

update service SET type = #{service.type}, content = #{service.content}, status = #{service.status}, spend_time = #{service.spend_time}, per_num = #{service.per_num}, per_contribution = #{service.per_contribution} where s_index = #{service.s_index} and r_id = #{service.r_id}

update technology set project_name = #{technology.project_name}, module_name = #{technology.module_name}, code_amount = #{technology.code_amount}, commit_bug = #{technology.commit_bug}, resolve_bug = #{technology.resolve_bug} where t_index = #{technology.t_index} and r_id = #{technology.r_id}

delete from course where c_index = #{index} and r_id = #{r_id}

delete from service where s_index = #{index} and r_id = #{r_id}
delete from suggestion where s_index = #{index} and r_id = #{r_id}
